insert into calendar values ( #{id}, #{start}, #{end}, #{title}, #{content}, #{share} )
mapper.select: select calendar.id, calendar.start, calendar.`end`, calendar.title, calendar.content, calendar.share, e.name , d.name AS depname, c.name AS cname from calendar inner join employee e on calendar.share = e.id inner join department d on e.department_id = d.id inner join code c on e.pos_id = c.id AND c.type_id = 300 where calendar.id = #{id}

select calendar.id , calendar.`start` , calendar.`end` , calendar.title , ce.user_yn, calendar.content , calendar.share, ce.employee_id, e.name from calendar inner join calendar_emp ce on calendar.id = ce.calendar_id inner join employee e on ce.employee_id = e.id inner join department d on e.department_id = d.id
select c.id AS calendar_id , e.id AS employee_id from calendar c inner join calendar_emp ce on c.id = ce.calendar_id inner join employee e on e.department_id = ce.employee_id where e.id != #{share}
select ce.calendar_id , ce.employee_id from calendar_emp ce inner join department d on ce.employee_id = d.id
mapper.delete: delete from calendar_emp where calendar_id= #{calendarId} and employee_id = #{employeeId}
